    EditBooking - Class in bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.commands

    execute(FlightBookingSystem) - Method in class bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.commands.DeleteFlight

    execute(FlightBookingSystem) - Method in class bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.commands.EditBooking
    Executes the booking update, removing the passenger from the old flight, adding them to the new flight (with the seat type if applicable), and applying a rebooking fee.
